name: Selka
appearance: Silver-streaked braid pinned with bone-lace combs, salt-brick coat trimmed in kelp-silk, a signet of the Anchor-Compact on a moon-iron chain she keeps tucked inside her collar.
character: Measured and maternal in tone, but relentless in pursuit of leverage; her patience is a net that tightens slowly.
talents: near-perfect recall for debts and favors
calms a room with a single phrase
dreams: Unify Dorsalhaven’s factions under a lasting compact
End pirate tributes through a binding treaty
Secure a reliable inland lifeline via the Sky-Quay
secrets: Bribed a clerk to misfile liability ledgers from the Night of Unmoored Chains
Knows of the meteoric moon-iron link beneath the Hall and uses its ‘caution’ to sway hesitant speakers
Pays a private stipend to a Hookcutter intermediary to soften demands without the Compact’s knowledge
